sentences.sContent: What would you do if someone tried to rob you in the street?
sentences.sCn: 要是有人在街上抢劫你，你会怎么办？

sentences.sContent: Will someone please explain what’s going on?
Have Brooks or someone fax this to New York right away.
sentences.sCn: 叫布鲁克斯或谁立刻把这个发传真到纽约。

trans.tranOther: used to mean a person, when you do not know or do not say who the person is
